prompts: Create a dark-type Pokemon that resembles a wolf with a fierce appearance.
Imagine a Pokemon that has sharp features and a grey color palette, perfect for stealth.
Generate a creature with a playful demeanor and a mix of black and gray fur.
Make a Pokemon that can thrive in urban and forest environments, showcasing its adaptability.
Show me a quadruped Pokemon with a sleek body and an energetic personality.
Design a Pokemon that embodies loyalty and has striking yellow eyes contrasted against dark fur.
Give me a Pokemon that is small in size but has a bold attitude and a cunning nature.
